title: Sleep timer not working for new 4a5g . I have tried audible's sleep timer and a sleep timer app
content:
I am trying to get the sleep timer to work with audible books.  
I have tried audible's sleep timer and a sleep timer app that has worked fine on an older pixel and a one plus 6t.  What is happening is, when I turn on the sleep timer is looks like it's going to work, but as soon as the screen times out, the sleep timers stop counting down.
